displayProperties.name: Live Fire Sale
displayProperties.description: Raid Banners sold from Hawthorne cost less.

displayProperties.name: Cast No Shadows
displayProperties.description: Dealing melee damage increases this weapon's handling and loads a small amount of ammo from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Generosity
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets while transcendent creates Orbs of Power for your allies.

displayProperties.name: The Perfect Fifth
displayProperties.description: Every five hits attaches a delayed detonation.

displayProperties.name: Resonant Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a resonant appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Prismatic Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a prismatic appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Physic
displayProperties.description: Rapidly healing allies grants you and your allies restoration for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Spindle
displayProperties.description: Threadling damage increases this weapon's damage.

displayProperties.name: Expanding Abyss
displayProperties.description: Void sources deal increased damage to weakened targets.

displayProperties.name: Argent Blade
displayProperties.description: While you have Armor Charge, dealing damage with a Sword consumes an Armor Charge and empowers your Sword for a short time, granting it bonus damage and energy charge rate.

displayProperties.name: Prismatic Transfer
displayProperties.description: When you cast your Super, each member of your fireteam with a Super type different than yours gains a bonus to weapon damage.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Transference
displayProperties.description:
Gain increased grenade and melee damage while transcendent.

Weapon final blows while transcendent refund Light and Dark energy after Transcendence ends.

displayProperties.name: Shieldcrush
displayProperties.description:
While you have Woven Mail, Frost Armor, or a Void Overshield, your melee recharges faster and deals increased damage.

While you are amplified or radiant, your grenade recharges faster and deals increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Echoes of Glory
displayProperties.description:
Grants {var:99725286}% additional Failsafe vendor reputation from all sources. For each piece of armor equipped with this perk, this bonus increases to a maximum of {var:3772573538}% (3 pieces).

The class item from this set will contribute as though you were wearing {var:1637760185} pieces.

displayProperties.name: Arc Conductor
displayProperties.description: Heavy attacks surge lightning from the user.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Frame
displayProperties.description:
Powerful, heavy swings.
[Heavy Attack]  : Slam.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Justice
displayProperties.description: While transcendent, your ability final blows explode.

displayProperties.name: Wave Sword Frame
displayProperties.description:
Heavy attack deploys a shockwave uppercut and launches the user into the air.

An immediate follow up swing after the uppercut deploys a homing strike that aggressively seeks a target.

displayProperties.name: Diamond Lance
displayProperties.description:
Shatter or defeat targets with abilities or [Stasis] Stasis weapons to create a Stasis lance.

[Shoot]  : Throw the lance to freeze targets on impact.

[Melee]  : Slam the lance to the ground to freeze targets in a small area.

displayProperties.name: Support Frame
displayProperties.description:
Flexible and agile frame capable of healing allies and hurting foes. Harming targets builds a restorative charge.

Hip firing at allies while this weapon is charged heals them, with rapid healing increasing weapon damage and bestowing restoration to your allies.

displayProperties.name: Paracausal Imbuement
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant Super energy. This weapon gains bonus damage once your Super expires.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Courage
displayProperties.description: Your [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, and [Void] Void abilities deal increased damage to targets afflicted with Darkness debuffs.

displayProperties.name: Inverse Relationship
displayProperties.description:
When you deal damage with this weapon, it gains increased handling, takes reduced flinch, and movement speed is increased for a short time.

When you are at reduced health, this weapon deals additional damage.

displayProperties.name: THE END DRAWS NEAR
displayProperties.description: The air buzzes with anticipation. You feel an itch in your mind as the Witness bends the Light to its will, reshaping reality. Soon its power will be beyond your reckoning. It must be stopped.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Valor
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased melee ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Grace
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that randomly provides the effects of one of the other Pale Blessing mods.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Remedy
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased health regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Resurgence
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased grenade ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Facet
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased class ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Aegis
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides a regenerating overshield.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Insight
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased Super ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: The Lost Voice
displayProperties.description: Healing grenades spawn a Restorative Turret.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Proliferation
displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants with any source of Strand damage produces Threadlings. Defeating powerful combatants produces more Threadlings.

displayProperties.name: String Theory
displayProperties.description: Hits against marked targets deal increased damage and have a chance to refund ammo to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Cayde's Retribution
displayProperties.description: Acquire Orbs to fire Golden Gun shots.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Blessing
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows start health regeneration. While transcendent, melee final blows start health regeneration for you and nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Circle of Life
displayProperties.description: Rapidly healing allies grants this weapon a period of increased damage.

displayProperties.name: To the Pain
displayProperties.description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage greatly increases handling and aim assist until the weapon is stowed.

Taking more damage increases the effect.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Diffraction
displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants with Void damage has a chance to create Void seekers that track nearby targets and suppress them.

displayProperties.name: Of Hawks and Pigeons
displayProperties.description: Raid rotator challenges grant Spoils of Conquest. Trials wins grant additional Trials reputation.

displayProperties.name: Vortex Frame
displayProperties.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Radiant Orbs
displayProperties.description: While you have a Solar or Prismatic subclass equipped, picking up an Orb of Power makes you radiant.

displayProperties.name: Galvanic Armor
displayProperties.description: While you have an Arc or Prismatic subclass equipped, incoming damage from combatants is reduced while amplified.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Counter Energy
displayProperties.description: When you or a member of your fireteam stuns a champion, you gain energy for your least-charged ability.

displayProperties.name: Blade Stamina
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating combatants with a Sword refunds some ammo.

displayProperties.name: Void Hegemony
displayProperties.description: While you have a Void or Prismatic subclass equipped, defeating weakened targets provides a small Void Overshield.

displayProperties.name: Threat Remover
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with nearly all bullets in a spread increases reload speed, handling, and stability.

displayProperties.name: Dealer's Choice
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant a small amount of Super energy. Equipping multiple weapons from the Pale Heart increases this effect.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Archer's Gambit
displayProperties.description: Hipfire precision hits grant a massive draw speed bonus for an improved duration. Further precision hits extend the duration.

displayProperties.name: Well-Rested
displayProperties.description:
XP gains increased by 2x for your first {var:429946734} Season Ranks this week.

Completing Seasonal Challenges grants the most progress, followed by bounties and quests.

displayProperties.name: Stylostixis
displayProperties.description: Arcane Needle causes suspending detonations.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Command
displayProperties.description:
Freezing or suppressing a target reloads your equipped weapons and increases weapon stability, aim assist, and airborne effectiveness.

Defeating frozen or suppressed targets creates a Stasis Shard or Void Breach.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Ruin
displayProperties.description: Increases the size and damage of the burst when you shatter a Stasis crystal or frozen target, and increases the area of effect of Solar ignitions.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Awakening
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets with Light or Darkness damage or Super final blows generates an elemental pickup of the matching damage type.

displayProperties.name: Drengr's Lash
displayProperties.description: Activate Thruster to create an unstable knot of [Strand] Strand matter that detonates after a short delay, suspending and damaging targets.

displayProperties.name: Transcendent Duelist
displayProperties.description:
This weapon collects less ammo. Final blows with this weapon accelerate Light and Darkness mastery.
Deals increased damage while Transcendent; defeating targets lengthens Transcendence.

displayProperties.name: Song of Flame
displayProperties.description:
Unleash your inner fire, making your equipped weapons radiant and enhancing your abilities.

[Melee]  : Release a supercharged melee attack that launches additional projectiles.

[Grenade]  : Create a sentient flame wisp that seeks out targets and detonates in a scorching explosion, then seeks out other nearby targets.

While Song of Flame is active, you and nearby allies regenerate abilities more quickly, are more resistant to incoming damage, and your [Solar] Solar and Kinetic weapons scorch targets.

displayProperties.name: Overcharged Armory
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Dealer's Choice, Radiolaria Transposer, Collective Purpose, and Sundering Origin traits are always Overcharged weapons for you when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Authorized Mod: Elemental Charge
displayProperties.description: The energy cost of Elemental Charge mods are significantly discounted.

displayProperties.name: Logic Reductor
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Radiolaria Transposer origin perk deal increased damage to Vex. Extends the duration of the radiolaria pools created by Radiolaria Transposer.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Saint's Inspiration
displayProperties.description: Rounds loaded by the Cast No Shadows origin perk can overflow the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Winning Hand
displayProperties.description:
While using weapons with the Dealer's Choice origin trait, combatant precision final blows or rapidly defeating combatants cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby combatants.

Having several equipped weapons with the Dealer's Choice origin trait increases the effect of the explosion.

displayProperties.name: Caster Frame
displayProperties.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

displayProperties.name: Hellion
displayProperties.description: Activate your class ability to summon a [Solar] Solar mortar that lobs flaming projectiles at distant targets. Targets damaged by the mortar are scorched.

displayProperties.name: Air Trigger
displayProperties.description: Greatly increased ammo reserves. When airborne, accuracy and reload speed are further increased but target acquisition is decreased.

displayProperties.name: Physic
displayProperties.description: Rapidly healing allies grants restoration to you and your allies.

displayProperties.name: Air Trigger
displayProperties.description: Increased ammo reserves. When airborne, accuracy and reload speed are increased but target acquisition is decreased.

displayProperties.name: Eyes Up, Guardian
displayProperties.description: Collecting Orbs of Power strengthens this weapon's next several ricochet shots, providing more damage and more bounces between targets.

displayProperties.name: Renewal Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds the Traveler's renewal to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Orrery Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a planetary appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Burst
displayProperties.description: Fires a hard-hitting, two-round burst. Slightly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming.

displayProperties.name: Wish-Dragon's Talons
displayProperties.description: Gain an additional Frenzied Blade charge. Banner of War grants melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Redemption
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon cure you and increase reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Strategist
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon generate improved class ability energy. Activating your class ability briefly improves this weapon's stability.

displayProperties.name: Circle of Life
displayProperties.description: Rapidly healing allies grants this weapon an improved period of increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Hope
displayProperties.description: While you have an elemental buff, your class ability regenerates more quickly.

displayProperties.name: The Gift of Certainty
displayProperties.description: Improves Ascension and Tempest Strike.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Bravery
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with grenade final blows grants Volatile Rounds to your [Void] Void weapons. Defeating targets with powered melee final blows grants Unraveling Rounds to your [Strand] Strand weapons.

displayProperties.name: Property: Unavoidable
displayProperties.description: Targets near the blast of Property: Irreducible are [afflicted|burdened|cursed] with an elemental effect matching your equipped grenade's damage type.

displayProperties.name: Desperate Measures
displayProperties.description: Weapon final blows grant bonus damage for an improved duration. Melee and grenade final blows grant a larger damage bonus that can stack.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Devotion
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets afflicted with [Stasis] Stasis or [Strand] Strand debuffs grants bonus Light Transcendence energy.

displayProperties.name: Gunpowder Gamble
displayProperties.description:
Defeat targets with abilities, elemental debuff damage, or [Solar] Solar weapons to charge up an improvised [Solar] Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a [Solar] Solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.

displayProperties.name: Helping Hand
displayProperties.description: Final blows charge this weapon. When the weapon is charged, the next final blow creates a healing burst at your location and leaves a remnant behind that provides restoration to allies.

displayProperties.name: Area Denial Frame
displayProperties.description: Burst fire Grenade Launcher. Each projectile creates a lingering pool on impact that deals damage over time.

displayProperties.name: Gathering Light
displayProperties.description: Stowing weapon restores ability energy based on final blows.

displayProperties.name: Stormbringer
displayProperties.description: Rapid final blows create a lightning storm.

displayProperties.name: Double Down
displayProperties.description: Improves Threaded Specter.

displayProperties.name: Unplanned Reprieve
displayProperties.description: Heavy attacks emit delayed detonating projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Insectoid Robot Grenades
displayProperties.description: Final blows deploy homing robot grenades.

displayProperties.name: Reverberation
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase the size of its detonations for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Grace
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with Kinetic weapons grants you bonus Transcendence energy. Defeating targets with your Super grants you and nearby allies bonus Transcendence energy.

displayProperties.name: Lightweight Frame
displayProperties.description:
Fast movement.
[Heavy Attack]  : Dash attack.

displayProperties.name: Strand Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Strand damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Wave Sword Frame
displayProperties.description:
Heavy attack deploys a shockwave uppercut and launches the user into the air.

An immediate follow up swing after the uppercut deploys a homing strike that aggressively seeks a target.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Danger Close
displayProperties.description: Precision weapon hits load rockets. Activating a class ability fires them.

displayProperties.name: The Right Choice
displayProperties.description: Every seventh shot bounces.

displayProperties.name: Threat Remover
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with all bullets in a spread increases reload speed, handling, and stability.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Honor
displayProperties.description: Collecting an elemental pickup or destroying a Tangle grants Transcendence energy of the same type.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Transference
displayProperties.description: Sprinting for a short time causes you to become amplified. While you are amplified, melee damage creates lightning bolts which damage nearby combatants.

displayProperties.name: Echoes of Glory
displayProperties.description:
Grants {var:99725286}% additional Failsafe vendor reputation from all sources. For each piece of armor equipped with this perk, this bonus increases to a maximum of {var:3772573538}% (3 pieces).

The class item from this set will contribute as though you were wearing {var:1637760185} pieces.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Feed the Void
displayProperties.description:
Defeat a target with any ability to activate Devour.

Your Devour effects are improved, restoring additional health and grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Overload Sword
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits with a Sword you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. 

Additionally, Swords are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Ritualist
displayProperties.description: Earn bonus crafted weapon XP from completing ritual playlist activities.

displayProperties.name: Bountiful Bounties
displayProperties.description: The first clan bounty completed each week grants an Exotic engram.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Defiance
displayProperties.description: Finishers create a detonation that either jolts, scorches, slows, severs, or makes targets volatile based on the damage type of your equipped Super.

displayProperties.name: Sacred Flame
displayProperties.description: Heavy attacks mark targets; light attacks detonate them.

displayProperties.name: Paracausal Beam
displayProperties.description: Beam deals Kinetic damage with bonus damage to shields.

displayProperties.name: To the Pain
displayProperties.description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage increases handling and aim assist until the weapon is stowed.

Taking more damage increases the effect.

displayProperties.name: One for Thrall
displayProperties.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage, range, handling, and aim assist for a moderate duration.

displayProperties.name: Strategist
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon generate class ability energy. Activating your class ability briefly improves this weapon's stability.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Protection
displayProperties.description: While surrounded by combatants, you are more resistant to incoming damage. While transcendent, the effect is increased.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Fervor
displayProperties.description: Sliding after sprinting for a short time sends forth a burning line of fire, dealing damage and scorching targets in its path.

displayProperties.name: Command Frame
displayProperties.description: Fires extended-range, heavy-caliber projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Multiplicity
displayProperties.description: Finisher final blows convert your next thrown grenade into a bonus fragmentation grenade.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Animus
displayProperties.description: Defeating a combatant has a chance to create a random elemental pickup or Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Abundance
displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants with your grenade has a chance to spawn Special ammo. Defeating combatants with your Super ability has a chance to spawn Heavy ammo.

displayProperties.name: Weaver's Call
displayProperties.description:
Activate your class ability to weave three Threadlings and deploy any Threadlings you have perched.

Targets defeated by [Strand] Strand damage have a chance to generate a perched Threadling.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Chill
displayProperties.description: [Stasis] Stasis weapon final blows have a chance to create a Stasis Shard.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Reversal
displayProperties.description: While you have Frost Armor, melee damage slows your target.

displayProperties.name: Stylish Executioner
displayProperties.description:
Defeating a target affected by any elemental debuff grants invisibility and Truesight.

After performing a Stylish Execution, your next melee attack while invisible weakens targets.

displayProperties.name: Wolfpack Rounds
displayProperties.description: Heavy attacks grant cluster missiles to Sword wielders.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Twilight Arsenal
displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Summon three Void axes and throw them at your foes one after another. On impact, the axes pull in nearby targets and detonate in a weakening explosion. After exploding, the axes can be picked up by you or your allies and used as a weapon for a short time.

While carrying a Void axe:
[Light Attack]  : Slash forward with your axe, dealing damage and weakening targets.
[Heavy Attack]  : Throw the axe, consuming all remaining ammo.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Surge
displayProperties.description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to blink forward, calling down lightning strikes that jolt targets as you rematerialize.

displayProperties.name: Strangest Favor
displayProperties.description: Grants extra Strange Coins when completing Vanguard Ops or Onslaught activities, or also for winning Crucible or Gambit matches. Rewards increase with additional stacks.

displayProperties.name: Stranger Favor
displayProperties.description: Grants extra Strange Coins when completing Vanguard Ops or Onslaught activities, or also for winning Crucible or Gambit matches. Rewards increase with additional stacks.

displayProperties.name: Strange Favor
displayProperties.description: Grants extra Strange Coins when completing Vanguard Ops or Onslaught activities, or also for winning Crucible or Gambit matches. Rewards increase with additional stacks.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Dawn
displayProperties.description: Powered melee hits against targets makes you radiant. Powered melee final blows make you and nearby allies radiant.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Anti-barrier Submachine Gun
displayProperties.description:
Submachine Guns you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Additionally, Submachine Guns are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Overload Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits with any Hand Cannon you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. 

Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description: Aiming down the sights of a Scout Rifle for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Sidearm
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down the sights of a Sidearm for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

Additionally, Sidearms are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Pulse Rifles fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Magnificent Howl
displayProperties.description: The number of precision final blows before reloading affects the total rounds granted with increased range and damage. Precision final blows with Magnificent Howl active extend the effect for additional rounds. Improves reload.

displayProperties.name: Radiolaria Transposer
displayProperties.description: Rapid final blows cause targets to explode into a pool of radiolarian fluid.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Purpose
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants either Amplified, Restoration, Frost Armor, Woven Mail, or Overshield based on the damage type of your equipped Super.

displayProperties.name: Ascension
displayProperties.description: [Air Move]  While airborne, consume your class ability energy to summon your Arc Staff, propelling yourself upward and creating a burst of energy around you that amplifies allies and jolts targets.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Sacrifice
displayProperties.description: While you have an Arc, Solar, or Void buff, ability final blows grant bonus Darkness Transcendence energy.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Sharpshooter
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains passive bonuses to target acquisition, aim down sight speed, and flinch resistance. The bonus increases when this weapon's super mode is active.

displayProperties.name: Alloy Completionist
displayProperties.description: Completing all clan challenges in a week grants an Ascendant Alloy.

displayProperties.name: Unbreakable
displayProperties.description:
[Grenade]  : Hold to summon a [Void] Void shield and block a portion of incoming damage, gradually draining your grenade energy and granting an overshield over time.

Releasing the grenade input or running out of energy releases a frontal blast from your shield that deals increased damage based on how much damage was blocked.

Combatants that come in contact with your shield are temporarily disoriented.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Fanatical Lance
displayProperties.description:
Rapid final blows cause targets to explode into a pool of radiolarian fluid.

Hip firing launches multiple projectiles at once in a slower moving spread pattern. Projectiles detonate on impact.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Mending
displayProperties.description: Grenade final blows cure you. Transcendence grenade final blows increase the strength of the effect.

displayProperties.name: Reverberation
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase the size of its detonations for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Dominance
displayProperties.description: Your Void grenades weaken targets, and your Arc grenades jolt targets.

displayProperties.name: Master of Arms
displayProperties.description: Final blows with any weapon improve this weapon's damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Sublimation
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating combatants with Stasis weapons creates a Stasis mine that damages and freezes nearby combatants.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid final blows with a Kinetic weapon or a weapon matching your equipped Super create an elemental pickup that matches your equipped Super.

displayProperties.name: Creeping Chill
displayProperties.description: Stasis weapon final blows against slowed or frozen targets release a burst that slows.

displayProperties.name: Threaded Blast
displayProperties.description: Destroying a Tangle with a Strand weapon creates a larger and more damaging explosion.

displayProperties.name: Press The Advantage
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield grants increased weapon stability, handling, and reload speed. Swords gain increased guard resistance.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Balance
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets with Light damage grants melee energy. Rapidly defeating targets with Darkness damage grants grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Solitude
displayProperties.description: Landing rapid precision hits emits a severing blast from the target. While transcendent, the severing blast is bigger.

displayProperties.name: Unwound
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage spawns Threadlings.
